attributes.action: Force Nestle to bring back plastic lids on Smarties.....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I was horrified to find out through a friend (cheers V) that the swine’s at Nestle have removed the tubs and lid on Smarties and replaced this with a cardboard cover! And to make matters worse its a flippin hexagon shape too!

How can we now collect lids and spell our names...our pets...the ones we love?!?!

How can we remove the bottoms and fire the lids at our siblings/mates/other family members???

What is the world coming too?

Orange Smarties are still alive though so all is not lost :)

BRING BACK SMARTIE LIDS!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
